thread.title: GW & Nitro advance to semi-finals

author: @WSAZnews
title: GW & Nitro advance to semi-finals
text:
GW & Nitro advance to semi-finals
CHARLESTON, W.Va. (WSAZ) - Some of the Friday semi-finals are set at the 2025 WV boys state basketball tournament with two local teams punching their tickets to them. George Washington beat University 62-42 with Noah Lewis scoring 24 points and the Patriots play Morgantown in the Class AAAA final four on Friday at 7:15 p.m.
In the 11:15 am game, Nitro outscored Ripley 15-8 in the fourth quarter and won 48-45 and will play the winner of Shady Spring and Robert C. Byrd who take the court on Wednesday night at 7:15 p.m. The Wildcats were led in scoring by Collin Crouch who had 14 points. Ripley’s Brandon Sias and Matthew Stellato combined for 26 of the Vikings’ 45 points.
Here are the highlights from both games.
